DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 45 year 2 . Spectacle soft contact lens wearer 3 . Refraction : best sphere ( correct back vertex distance ) 6.00 Diopters ( D ) +4.00 D ; Astigmatism 0.00 D 0.75 D ; Near addition 40 cm ; Medium Add : +1.50 D +2.00 D ; High Add : +2.25 D +2.50 D 4 . Best spectacle correct visual acuity 6/9 good eye 5 . Willingness adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol 6 .
